Key Match Events: India won by 4 wickets (with 0 balls remaining)
Hardik Pandya hit a four off the last ball to win the match
Pakistan were 32 for 2 in the first six overs, 59 for 0 in the next six, and 7 for 3 in the next two overs
Shaheen Afridi removed Rohit Sharma with a 145kmph delivery
Arshdeep Singh took out Babar Azam with a peach of an inswinger
Mohammed Rizwan was dismissed lbw by Arshdeep Singh
Shan Masood went for a single that was never on, and was run out by Virat Kohli
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MCG HAS GONE MAD! KOHLI IS PLAYING LIKE... KOHLI AGAIN!
